name: Heartz - BoomGem
description:
This 1-keyboard 2-player gem game allows you to explode emeralds, rubies, diamonds, and hidden sapphires.

Controls:

Purple:

- Move: Arrow Keys

- Sapphire Seeker: RightCtrl

Yellow:

- Move: WASD

- Sapphire Seeker: Spacebar

Made with GameMaker by YoYo Games.
